attributes.action: Ban the sale of Vehicle Registration Plates On eBay (Prevent Cloning, and theft)
attributes.additional_details:
You can only get a vehicle number plate manufactured by an RNPS registered number plate supplier.

Use the following link for more info.
https://www.gov.uk/displaying-number-plates/getting-number-plates-made-up

Suppliers on eBay are avoid these legal requirements, and offer a cheap, illegal alternative, "SHOW PLATES" (Officially banned by the DVLA) 

Your registration mark is at risk, your car could be cloned at the click of a button.

Protect yourself, and  Sign this petition!!!
attributes.background:
Purchasing Number Plates on eBay couldn't be easier, eBay has over 17,000 listings for Number Plates, However over 90% of these listings, are for illegal Number plates

Criminals are using the eBay as a gateway to Vehicle Theft, Car Cloning, speed camera avoidance, and other illegal activities

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament can't stop just one company doing something. You could start a new petition calling for the sale of these items to be banned in the UK.
